mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where we believe every dollar you deserve is already yours. Join us today and start living the entitled life you were born for!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into my favorite caf with an air of entitlement so thick you could practically taste it. I casually ordered my usual foamy latte with an extra shot of arrogance, when suddenly, the barista had the audacity to inform me that they were out of organic almond milk. Outraged, I felt my entitlement levels skyrocket to unprecedented heights.With a dramatic flair, I slammed my designer sunglasses onto the counter and declared, "How dare you deprive me of my preferred dairy alternative?! Do you have any idea who I am? I am Hot Josh, CEO of Bank of Entitlement, and I demand the finest almond milk be sourced and delivered to me immediately!"The poor barista, clearly shaken by my display of entitlement prowess, quickly scurried off to fulfill my demand. Minutes later, a fresh carton of organic almond milk was presented to me, along with profuse apologies for the oversight. With a smug smile, I graciously accepted the offering, knowing that once again, my entitlement had triumphed.As I sipped my perfectly crafted latte, I basked in the sweet glory of my entitlement victory, secure in the knowledge that the world would always bend to accommodate my every whim. After all, when you're Hot Josh, CEO of Bank of Entitlement, the universe is simply a stage for your entitlement to shine.
